mapper.select:
SELECT A.APLYID , C.CD_NM AS CLSF_CD_NM , B.TTL , E.INST_NM , DATE(A.REG_DT) AS APLY_DT , A.REG_DT FROM TB_CMM_CNTST_APLY A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CNTST B ON A.CNTSTID = B.CNTSTID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD C ON B.CLSF_CD = C.CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_USER D ON B.RGTRID = D.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_INST E ON D.INSTID = E.INSTID WHERE 1=1 AND A.USERID = #{user.userid}
AND B.TTL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTtl},'%')

SELECT A.APLYID , C.CD_NM AS CLSF_CD_NM , B.TTL , DATE_FORMAT(B.APLY_BGNG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') APLY_BGNG_DT , DATE_FORMAT(B.APLY_END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') APLY_END_DT , DATE_FORMAT(B.PRSNTN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') PRSNTN_DT , DATE(A.REG_DT) AS APLY_DT
, A.APLY_SE_CD , A.PCNTST_FLD_CD , A.APLY_PATH_CD , CD1.CD_NM AS APLY_SE_CD_NM , CD2.CD_NM AS PCNTST_FLD_CD_NM , CD3.CD_NM AS APLY_PATH_CD_NM
, A.RPRSV_NM , INST.INST_NM , A.BRDT , A.RPRSV_MOBLPHON , A.EML , A.ADDR , A.ADDR_DTL
, A.PRDCT_TTL , A.PRDCT_EXPLN , A.PRDCT_FILEGRPID
, B.GDNC
, B.TRMS FROM TB_CMM_CNTST_APLY A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CNTST B ON A.CNTSTID = B.CNTSTID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD C ON B.CLSF_CD = C.CD
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD CD1 ON A.APLY_SE_CD = CD1.CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD CD2 ON A.PCNTST_FLD_CD = CD2.CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD CD3 ON A.APLY_PATH_CD = CD3.CD
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_USER USER ON A.USERID = USER.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_cmm_inst INST ON A.INSTID = INST.INSTID WHERE A.APLYID = #{aplyid}

SELECT C.FLD_CD , D.CD_NM AS FlD_MAPNG_NM FROM TB_CMM_CNTST_APLY A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CNTST B ON A.CNTSTID = B.CNTSTID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CNTST_FLD_MAPNG C ON B.CNTSTID = C.CNTSTID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD D ON C.FLD_CD = D.CD WHERE A.APLYID = #{aplyid}

SELECT APLY_SCHLID , SCHL_NM , TCHER_NM , TCHER_GNDR , TELNO , B.CD AS PCNTST_FLD_CD , B.CD_NM AS PCNTST_FLD_CD_NM , STDNT_MALE , STDNT_FEMALE FROM TB_CMM_CNTST_APLY_SCHL A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD B ON A.PCNTST_FLD_CD = B.CD WHERE A.APLYID = #{aplyid}
